channel.title: Fight Pits
channel.description:
Hello.
My Fight Pits is almost 100% the only downfall that is bothering it is when you enter the minigame is their is no attack option. Help anybody?

item.title: Fight Pits
item.dc:creator: @loved loved
item.description:
@loved wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:5, topic:327575”]if(isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) || isInDuel() || isInFightPits()) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); // command slot outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize();

change isInFightPits to whatever your method for being inside the pits is.[/quote]

How do I do that?

Read full topic

item.title: Fight Pits
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

if(isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) || isInDuel() || isInFightPits()) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); // command slot outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize();

change isInFightPits to whatever your method for being inside the pits is.

Read full topic

item.title: Fight Pits
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

Make it so when you enter the game, it does this.

outStream.writeString("Attack");

Read full topic

item.title: Fight Pits
item.dc:creator: @loved loved
item.description:
@loved wrote:

if(isInWilderness(absX, absY, 1) || isInDuel()) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(3); // command slot outStream.writeByteA(0); // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Attack"); outStream.endFrameVarSize();

public String statName[] = { "attack", "defence", "strength", "hitpoints", "range", "prayer", "magic", "cooking", "woodcutting", "fletching", "fishing", "firemaking", "crafting", "smithing", "mining", "herblore", "agility", "thieving", "slayer", "farming", "runecrafting"};

outStream.writeString("Attack");

Read full topic
